meanings.definition: embody or represent in human form
meanings.sent1: The character in the story incarnates bravery by always standing up for what is right.
meanings.sent2: Love incarnates itself in acts of kindness and compassion towards others.
meanings.sent3: The superhero incarnates the power of justice, fighting villains to protect the city.
meanings.sent4: Her smile incarnates sunshine, brightening up even the gloomiest of days.
meanings.sent5: The artist's painting incarnates beauty, capturing the essence of nature on canvas.

meanings.definition: manifest or exemplify in a physical form
meanings.sent1: The bright stars incarnate the beauty of the night sky.
meanings.sent2: His hard work incarnates in the form of a successful business that he built from scratch.
meanings.sent3: The delicious aroma of freshly baked cookies incarnates in the kitchen, tempting everyone to indulge.
meanings.sent4: The music of the orchestra incarnates a symphony of emotions, touching the hearts of all who listen.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the painting incarnate the artist's passion and creativity.
